NXL          | 1.0% || karlsenhashv2 | KLS                          | 1.0% || kawpow        | RVN, AIPG, XNA, CLORE, NEOX  | 1.0% || nexapow       | NEXA                         | 2.0% || octopus (pre-fork)               | 3.0% || xelishashv2   | XEL                          | 2.0% || zil           | ZIL                          | 0%   |Dual mining* (abelian/autolykos2/ethash/ethash/ethashb3/fishhash/octopus)+alephium* (abelian/autolykos2/ethash/ethash/ethashb3/fishhash/octopus)+karlsenhash* (abelian/autolykos2/ethash/ethash/ethashb3/fishhash/octopus)+pyrinhash* (abelian/autolykos2/ethash/ethash/ethashb3/fishhash/octopus)+pyrinhashv2*
